title: Back-End Development
description: Experienced in NodeJS for building robust server-side applications. Proficient in SQL and NoSQL databases, with a focus on PostgreSQL. Skilled in implementing APIs like Mapbox, Google Login, and Razorpay. Strong in LDAP for secure authentication. Experienced in deploying on Linux, Windows servers, and Azure.

title: Front-End Development
description: Skilled in JavaScript, JQuery, and Angular for creating dynamic, responsive user interfaces. Focus on designing user-friendly experiences across browsers and devices.

title: Other Skills
description: Strong in multi-project management, ensuring timely, high-quality deliveries. Experienced with Azure cloud services. Known for analytical skills, teamwork, and effective communication. Committed to continuous learning and staying updated with industry trends.
